=== Use Selenium WebDriver library to drive Firefox ===
The following code launch Firefox and search the word "England"

 {{{
Sub Test_WebDriver()
    Dim lBridge As New NetComBridgeLib.NetComBridge
    Dim webdriver As NetComBridgeLib.Instance
    lBridge.LoadLibrary "C:\net35\WebDriver.dll"
    Set webdriver = lBridge.Type("OpenQA.Selenium.Firefox.FirefoxDriver").Instantiate0().CastAs("OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver")
    webdriver.Method("Navigate").Invoke0().Method("GoToUrl").Invoke1 "http://www.google.com"
    webdriver.Method("FindElement").Invoke1( _
            lBridge.Type("OpenQA.Selenium.By").Method("Id").Invoke1("lst-ib") _
        ).Method("SendKeys").Invoke1 ("England")
    webdriver.Method("FindElement").Invoke1( _
            lBridge.Type("OpenQA.Selenium.By").Method("Name").Invoke1("btnG") _
        ).Method("Click").Invoke0
    webdriver.Method("Quit").Invoke0
End Sub
 }}}

=== Use Selenium WebDriverBackedSelenium library to drive Firefox ===
The following code launch Firefox and search the word "England"
 {{{
Sub Test_WebDriverBackedSelenium()
    Dim lBridge As New NetComBridgeLib.NetComBridge
    Dim selenium As NetComBridgeLib.Instance
    lBridge.LoadLibrary "C:\net35\WebDriver.dll"
    lBridge.LoadLibrary "C:\net35\Selenium.WebDriverBackedSelenium.dll"
    lBridge.LoadLibrary "C:\net35\ThoughtWorks.Selenium.Core.dll"
    Set selenium = lBridge.Type("Selenium.WebDriverBackedSelenium").Instantiate2( _
            lBridge.Type("OpenQA.Selenium.Firefox.FirefoxDriver").Instantiate0(), _
            "http://www.google.com" _
        ).CastAs("Selenium.ISelenium")
    selenium.Method("Start").Invoke0
    selenium.Method("Open").Invoke1 "/"
    selenium.Method("Type").Invoke2 "id=lst-ib", "England"
    selenium.Method("Click").Invoke1 "name=btnG"
    selenium.Method("Close").Invoke0
End Sub
 }}}
